snippet.title: Old World -- Ox Hide Carthage Scenario Unlocked
snippet.description:
We are proud to launch another way to experience Old World - introducing our history-inspired The Rise of Carthage Campaign! Across multiple scenarios, you will take Carthage from a small colony on the North African coast to a mighty empire that shapes the course of human history.
Old World is available in Early Access now, on the Epic Games Store: 
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US...​

Check out Mohawk Games at:
https://www.mohawkgames.com/​
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/mohawkgames​
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/MohawkGames​
Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/mohawk.games/​
Join our community on Discord: 
https://discord.gg/BNVpEgJ​

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for the latest news!
